member.name: T:LibINI.IO.IniReader
member.summary: Provides a configurable method for reading and parsing INI-format data into an IniFile object.

member.name: M:LibINI.IO.IniReader.#ctor(LibINI.IO.IniReaderSettings)
member.summary: Initialized a new instance of the IniReader class using the supplied IniReaderSettings.

member.name: M:LibINI.IO.IniReader.Read(System.IO.Stream,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Reads an IniFile from the supplied stream and returns it.

member.name: T:LibINI.IO.IniWriter
member.summary: Provides a configurable method of persisting an IniFile and it's contents as INI-format data.

member.name: M:LibINI.IO.IniWriter.#ctor(LibINI.IO.IniWriterSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the IniWriter class using the supplied IniWriterSettings.

member.name: M:LibINI.IO.IniWriter.Write(System.IO.Stream,LibINI.IniFile)
member.summary: Writes an IniFile to the supplied Stream.

member.name: T:LibINI.IO.IniWriterSettings
member.summary: Provides a way to customize the operation of an IniWriter.

member.name: F:LibINI.IO.IniWriterSettings.CommentChar
member.summary: Gets or sets the character used to designate comment lines.

member.name: F:LibINI.IO.IniWriterSettings.ValueDelimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the character used to separate name and value in an IniEntry.

member.name: T:LibINI.IO.IniReaderSettings
member.summary: Provides a way to customize the operation of an IniReader.

member.name: F:LibINI.IO.IniReaderSettings.CommentChar
member.summary: Gets or sets the character used to designate comment lines.

member.name: F:LibINI.IO.IniReaderSettings.EntryDuplicationHandlingMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the handling method to use when duplicate entries are found.

member.name: F:LibINI.IO.IniReaderSettings.ValueSeparator
member.summary: Gets or sets the character that is used to separate a key from a value.

member.name: F:LibINI.IO.IniReaderSettings.ValueConcatenationChar
member.summary: Gets or sets the character that is used as a separator when concatenating values.

member.name: P:LibINI.IO.IniReaderSettings.Win32Style
member.summary: Gets an IniReaderSettings that is preconfigured to handle most INI files created by windows or windows software.

member.name: P:LibINI.IO.IniReaderSettings.MaximumCompatability
member.summary: Gets an IniReaderSettings that is preconfigured to maintain maximum compatability.

member.name: T:LibINI.IniSection
member.summary: Represents a grouping of key/value pairs (IniEntry objects).

member.name: M:LibINI.IniSection.AddEntry(LibINI.IniEntry)
member.summary: Adds an IniEntry object to the current IniSection.
member.param: The IniEntry object to be added.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniSection.Clone
member.summary: Creates a deep copy of the current IniSection.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniSection.Clone(LibINI.IniFile)
member.summary: Creates a deep copy of the current IniSection.
member.returns: A full clone of the current IniSection.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniSection.CreateEntry(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new IniEntry using the specified name, adds it to the current IniSection, and returns it for further use.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniSection.CreateEntry(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new IniEntry using the specified name and value, adds it to the current IniSection, and returns it for further use.
member.param: The name of the new IniEntry.
A value to initialize the new IniEntry with.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniSection.ContainsEntry(LibINI.IniEntry)
member.summary: Determines whether an IniEntry exists in the current IniSection.
member.param: The IniEntry object to check existance for.
member.returns: True if the object is in the current IniSection's IniEntry list, otherwise false.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniSection.ContainsEntry(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether an IniEntry exists in the current IniSection.
member.param: The name of the IniEntry object to check existance for.
member.returns: True if the object is in the current IniSection's IniEntry list, otherwise false.

member.summary: Gets an enumerator for the current IniSection.

member.summary: Removes an IniEntry from the current IniSection.

member.summary: Removes an IniEntry from the current IniSection.

The new name of the IniEntry.

member.summary: Gets a nongeneric enumerator for the current IniSection.

member.summary: Gets an IniEntry contained in the current IniSection.

member.summary: Gets the name of the current IniElement.

member.name: T:LibINI.IniEntry
member.summary: Represents a single name/value pair inside of an IniSection. This class cannot be inherited.

member.summary: Creates and returns a deep clone of the current IniEntry.

member.summary: Creates and returns a deep clone of the current IniEntry.
member.returns: A deep clone of the current IniEntry.

member.name: P:LibINI.IniEntry.Comment
member.summary: Gets or sets a comment associated with the current IniEntry.

member.name: P:LibINI.IniEntry.CommentLines
member.summary: Gets or sets the lines of comments associated with the current IniEntry.

member.name: P:LibINI.IniEntry.File
member.summary: Gets the IniFile that owns the current IniEntry.

member.name: P:LibINI.IniEntry.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the current IniEntry.

member.name: P:LibINI.IniEntry.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value portion of the current IniEntry.

member.name: T:LibINI.IniValue
member.summary: Provides a strongly-typed way to store and retrieve values.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniValue.FromString(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new IniValue from a given string, guessing at the IniValueKind.

member.summary: Determines the IniValueKind of a supplied object.

member.summary: Gets or sets the actual object value associated with the current IniValue.

member.name: P:LibINI.IniValue.Kind
member.summary: Gets the IniValueKind of the current IniValue.

member.name: T:LibINI.IniFile
member.summary: Represents an INI-format configuration settings file, and contains methods to add, remove, and modify configuration settings. This class cannot be inherited.
member.remarks: This class provides the core functionality of LibINI.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the IniFile class.

member.name: F:LibINI.IniFile.InvalidNameChars
member.summary: Gets the chars that cannot be used for an IniSection or IniEntry name.

member.name: F:LibINI.IniFile.InvalidValueChars
member.summary: Gets a constant string containing chars that cannot be used for a IniEntry value.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.AddEntry(LibINI.IniSection,LibINI.IniEntry)
member.summary: Adds an IniEntry to an IniSection. If the specified IniSection does not exist in the current File, it will be added.
member.param: The IniSection to add to.
The IniEntry to be added.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.AddEntry(System.String,LibINI.IniEntry)
member.summary: Adds an IniEntry to an IniSection. If the specified IniSection does not exist in the current File object's list of IniSection objects, it will be created.
member.param: The name of the IniSection to add to.
The IniEntry to add.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.AddSection(LibINI.IniSection)
member.summary: Adds an IniSection to the current File.
member.param: The IniSection to add.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.Clone
member.summary: Creates and returns a full clone of the current File, recursively cloning all IniSections and IniEntries.
member.returns: A full clone of the current File.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.ContainsEntry(LibINI.IniSection,LibINI.IniEntry)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified IniEntry exists in the specified IniSection, and whether the specified IniSection exists in the current File's IniSection list.
member.param: The IniSection to check existance for.
The IniEntry to check existance for.
member.returns: True if section exists in the current File's IniSection list, and entry exists in section's IniEntry list, otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.ContainsEntry(LibINI.IniSection,System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified IniEntry exists in the specified IniSection, and whether the specified IniSection exists in the current File's IniSection list.
member.param: The IniSection to check existance for.
The name of the IniEntry to check existance for.
member.returns: True if section exists in the current File's IniSection list, and entry exists in section's IniEntry list, otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.ContainsEntry(System.String,LibINI.IniEntry)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified IniEntry exists in the specified IniSection, and whether the specified IniSection exists in the current File's IniSection list.
member.param: The name of the IniSection to check existance for.
The IniEntry to check existance for.
member.returns: True if section exists in the current File's IniSection list, and entry exists in section's IniEntry list, otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.ContainsEntry(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified IniEntry exists in the specified IniSection, and whether the specified IniSection exists in the current File's IniSection list.
member.param: The name of the IniSection to check existance for.
The name of the IniEntry to check existance for.
member.returns: True if section exists in the current File's IniSection list, and entry exists in section's IniEntry list, otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.ContainsSection(LibINI.IniSection)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified IniSection exists in the current File's IniSection list.
member.param: The IniSection to check existance for.
member.returns: True if section exists in the current File's IniSection list, otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.ContainsSection(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified IniSection exists in the current File's IniSection list.
member.param: The name of the IniSection to check existance for.
member.returns: True if section exists in the current File's IniSection list, otherwise returns false.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.CreateEntry(LibINI.IniSection,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an IniEntry in the specified IniSection. If the specified IniSection does not exist in the current File's IniSection list, it will be added.
member.param: The IniSection to create the new IniEntry in.
The name of the new IniEntry to create.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.CreateEntry(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an IniEntry in the specified IniSection. If the specified IniSection does not exist in the current File's IniSection list, it will be created.
member.param: The name of the IniSection to create the new IniEntry in.
The name of the new IniEntry to create.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.CreateSection(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new IniSection in the current File's IniSection list.
member.remarks: If a section already exists with the supplied name, it will be returned instead.
member.param: The name of the new IniSection to create.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an enumerator for the current IniFile.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.IsValidName(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified string can be used as a valid name for an IniSection or IniEntry object.
member.param: The name to validate.
member.returns: False if the name paramater contains any invalid chars.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.IsValidValue(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified name can be used as a valid value for an IniEntry.
member.param: The value to validate.
member.returns: False if the value paramater contains any invalid chars.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.RemoveEntry(LibINI.IniSection,LibINI.IniEntry)
member.summary: Removes an IniEntry from a specified IniSection.

The IniEntry to remove.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.RemoveEntry(LibINI.IniSection,System.String)
member.summary: Removes an IniEntry from a specified IniSection.
member.param: The IniSection to remove the IniEntry from.
The name of the IniEntry to remove.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.RemoveEntry(System.String,LibINI.IniEntry)
member.summary: Removes an IniEntry from a specified IniSection.
member.param: The name of the IniSection to remove the IniEntry from.
The IniEntry to remove.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.RemoveEntry(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Removes an IniEntry from a specified IniSection.
member.param: The name of the IniSection to remove the IniEntry from.
The name of the IniEntry to remove.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.RemoveSection(LibINI.IniSection)
member.summary: Removes an IniSection from the current File.
member.param: The IniSection to remove.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.RemoveSection(System.String)
member.summary: Removes an IniSection from the current File.
member.param: The name of the IniSection to remove.

member.name: M:LibINI.IniFile.RenameSection(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Renames an IniSection.
member.remarks: The IniSection being renamed must exist in the current IniFile.
member.param: The name of the IniSection to rename.
The new name of the IniSection.

member.name: P:LibINI.IniFile.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets or sets an IniSection in the current File. When setting an IniSection that does not exist in the current File, it will be added. When getting an IniSection that does not exist in the current File, a null will be returned.
member.param: The name of the IniSection to get or set.

member.name: P:LibINI.IniFile.IsCaseSensitive
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines if section and entry names are case-sensitive.

member.name: P:LibINI.IniFile.EntryCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of IniEntries contained in all IniSections in the current File.

member.name: P:LibINI.IniFile.DefaultSection
member.summary: Gets a pseudo-IniSection that is used to hold any IniEntry objects that are not actually placed in an IniSection.

member.name: P:LibINI.IniFile.SectionCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of IniSections contained in the current File.

member.name: T:LibINI.IO.IniEntryDuplicationHandlingMethod
member.summary: Controls the way duplicate IniEntries are handled when encountered during reading.

member.name: F:LibINI.IO.IniEntryDuplicationHandlingMethod.UseFirst
member.summary: Instructs the IniReader to use the first IniEntry it finds with any name.

member.name: F:LibINI.IO.IniEntryDuplicationHandlingMethod.UseLast
member.summary: Instructs the IniReader to use the last IniEntry it finds with any name.

member.name: F:LibINI.IO.IniEntryDuplicationHandlingMethod.Concatenate
member.summary: Instructs the IniReader to concatenate the values of any duplicate IniEntries.

member.name: F:LibINI.IO.IniEntryDuplicationHandlingMethod.MultiValue
member.summary: Instructs the IniReader to transform the value to a MultiValue.

member.name: F:LibINI.IO.IniEntryDuplicationHandlingMethod.RemoveAll
member.summary: Instructs the IniReader to remove all copies of the duplicate IniEntries (including the first and last).

member.name: T:LibINI.IniValueKind
member.summary: Used to indicate what kind of value an IniValue has.

member.name: F:LibINI.IniValueKind.Unknown
member.summary: The value's type is not recognized or not supported. Usually indicates that null will be returned for the value.

member.name: F:LibINI.IniValueKind.String
member.summary: The value is a string type.

member.name: F:LibINI.IniValueKind.Boolean
member.summary: The value is a bool type.

member.name: F:LibINI.IniValueKind.Number
member.summary: The value is an int type.

member.name: F:LibINI.IniValueKind.MultiString
member.summary: The value is a string[] type.
